comment: Creativity research reliably documents the importance of deep rest , and that the people privileged to be able to live highly creative lives often have these deep rest cycles built in . Has been missed in research often but profoundly predictive of work outcomes when included .

comment: Rest is required for learning ( & forgetting is required for learning ! ) . Learning isn't just mashing more content into a bucket-brain forever . Lots of effects ( from deliberate practice to spacing ) show cram / work ' til you drop methods are inefficient , destructive in the longterm .
